about_the_game:
"Nurse Call 恋のナースコール" is a visual novel game where the protagonist, Masatoshi, who is hospitalized after a traffic accident, falls in love while being cared for by two beautiful nurses.

The protagonist, Masatoshi Fujii, was rushed to a certain hospital due to an unfortunate accident.

When I woke up to the view of an unfamiliar ceiling.

But more importantly, two beautiful unfamiliar nurses!?

Due to a mistake by the head nurse, Masatoshi ends up being admitted to a VIP room,

and romantic feelings begin to develop during his treatment.

However, Masatoshi is not the only one who has started to crave something beyond a professional relationship.

Everyone's fantasy affair with a beautiful nurse!

And their dreams and goals are...

As they go through nursing and rehabilitation together, what will become of Masatoshi's relationship with these women?

・Aki Manabe

A rookie nurse at the hospital where Masatoshi was admitted.

Shee is clumsy and, when flustered, sometimes takes unexpected actions at the spur of the moment.

・Kotomi Honjou

Aki's senior, and another nurse in charge of Masatoshi's care.

She is dedicated and has a great reputation among the patients. She is fond of her junior, Aki.

・Masatoshi Fujii

A medical equipment salesman.

He was traveling to various hospitals for work but ended up being hospitalized himself after being injured in an accident.

content_descriptors.notes: Some scenes in the game include body swapping, mild sexual content, and texting car accident scenes. Not intended for children or all ages.
